Reviews.Title: This wireless camera uses the same frequency as the wireless network router
Reviews.Author: Runnershigh

Reviews.Title: Great, If your dont have WiFi
Reviews.Author: Coltfaglione

ProductInfo.Features:
380 TV Lines for clear image resolution
15ft (5m) infra-red night vision
Easy to install DIY home or business monitoring system
Automatically or manually switch camera views on your AV channel
Convenient wireless 2.4GHz transmission between cameras & receiver up to 150ft (50m)**Depending on local conditionsNote: Night vision images display in B&W;
ProductInfo.Name: Swann F-SW233-WO3 2.4 GHz 3 Wireless Color Cameras w/ Night Vision & Auto Switching Receiver
